mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY b.board_num DESC) rnum, TO_CHAR(b.board_createdDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS board_createDate, b.*, m.member_nickName, m.member_name, COUNT(l.like_num) AS like_count FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.member_num = m.member_num LEFT JOIN `like` l ON b.board_num = l.board_num WHERE b.board_cate = #{cate} GROUP BY b.board_num ORDER BY b.board_num DESC

SELECT b.*, m.member_nickName, m.member_name, COUNT(l.like_num) AS like_count FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.member_num = m.member_num LEFT JOIN `like` l ON b.board_num = l.board_num WHERE b.board_num = #{board_num}
SELECT c.*, m.member_nickName FROM comment c LEFT JOIN board b ON b.board_num = c.board_num LEFT JOIN member m ON m.member_num = c.member_num WHERE b.board_num = #{board_num}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY b.board_num DESC) rnum, TO_CHAR(b.board_createdDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS board_createDate, b.*, m.member_nickName, m.member_name, COUNT(l.like_num) AS like_count FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.member_num = m.member_num LEFT JOIN `like` l ON b.board_num = l.board_num WHERE b.board_cate = #{cate} AND b.board_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' GROUP BY b.board_num ORDER BY b.board_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (member_num, board_title, board_content, board_cate) VALUES (#{member_num}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_cate})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `like` WHERE board_num = #{board_num} AND member_num = #{member_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (board_num, member_num, comment_content) values (#{board_num}, #{member_num}, #{comment_content})
